projects.title: APPROACH SOLUTIONS
projects.description: A web and mobile application centering around payroll. Our business operations include rostering, performance monitoring, reporting, and auditing; all vital for efficiency and compliance. We also include billing, costing, and performance assessment.

projects.title: Garden Guru
projects.description: Created an interactive data visualization platform using D3.js and React, enabling users to generate insightful charts and graphs from complex datasets. Implemented real-time data updates and customizable visualization options.

projects.title: Edit Essay
projects.description: Successfully migrated legacy systems to a modern cloud infrastructure, improving system reliability and reducing operational costs by 40%. Implemented automated deployment pipelines and monitoring solutions.
